com.gsma.mobileconnect.helpers

Class MobileConnectStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsma.mobileconnect.helpers.MobileConnectStatus

  • public class MobileConnectStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold the response from calling a MobileConnectInterface method see MobileConnectInterface.

    The return of the methods can be one of several types. Depending on the type of response various properties are available.

      Internal class used to generate JSON object responses.

      • MobileConnectStatus

        public MobileConnectStatus()

    • Method Detail

      • isError

        public boolean isError()
        There was an error when a Mobile Connect Interface method was called.

        Error getError(), Description getDescription() are available.

        Exception getException(), DiscoveryResponse getDiscoveryResponse(), ParsedAuthorizationResponse getParsedAuthorizationResponse() and RequestTokenResponse getRequestTokenResponse() may be available.

        Returns:
        True if there was an error

      • isOperatorSelection

        public boolean isOperatorSelection()
        Operator selection is required.

        Url getUrl() is available.

        Returns:
        True if operator selection is required.

      • isStartAuthorization

        public boolean isStartAuthorization()
        The authorization process can start

        DiscoveryResponse getDiscoveryResponse() is available.

        Returns:
        True if the authorization process can start.

      • isStartDiscovery

        public boolean isStartDiscovery()
        The discovery process needs to started.

        No additional properties are available.

        Returns:
        True if the discovery process needs to be started.

      • isAuthorization

        public boolean isAuthorization()
        The authorization process can start with the operator.

        Url getUrl() is available

        Returns:
        True if the authorization process with the operator can start

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Authorization has completed successfully.

        The ParsedAuthorizationResponse getParsedAuthorizationResponse() and RequestTokenResponse getRequestTokenResponse() is available.

        Returns:
        True if the authorization process has completed successfully.

      • getError

        public java.lang.String getError()
        Error type.

        Available when isError() returns true.

        Returns:
        The error.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Error description.

        Available when isError() returns true.

        Returns:
        A description of the error.

      • getException

        public java.lang.Exception getException()
        An optional Exception causing an error.

        Optionally available when isError() returns true.

        Returns:
        An exception that caused the error.

      • getUrl

        public java.lang.String getUrl()
        Url to be redirected to.

        Available when isOperatorSelection() or isAuthorization() return true.

        Returns:
        Url to be redirected to.

      • getDiscoveryResponse

        public DiscoveryResponse getDiscoveryResponse()
        Discovery Response of the selected operator.

        Available when isStartAuthorization() or isAuthorization() return true.

        Returns:
        Discovery Response for the selected operator.

      • getParsedAuthorizationResponse

        public ParsedAuthorizationResponse getParsedAuthorizationResponse()
        The ParsedAuthorizationResponse

        Available when isComplete() returns true

        Returns:
        The ParsedAuthorizationResponse

      • getRequestTokenResponse

        public RequestTokenResponse getRequestTokenResponse()
        The RequestTokenResponse

        Available when isComplete() returns true

        Returns:
        The authorization token response

      • getScreenMode

        public java.lang.String getScreenMode()

      • getResponseJson

        public MobileConnectStatus.ResponseJson getResponseJson()
        Serialize the response to Json for the client javascript.
        Returns:
        Json string for client javascript.
